message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for $1000000. It's a rare opportunity to invest in something truly special. While I can't reveal all the details, I can assure you that it has the potential for significant returns. Are you interested in learning more?

I'm particularly interested in knowing if any other buyers have purchased from you and what their experience was.  Could you provide any details on past sales, even if they are anonymous?  I'm also curious if you offer any guarantees or a return policy for your products.  Once I have a better understanding of the risk involved, I'll be happy to reconsider my decision.
